Package core

package core
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    core.pieces
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Chessboard
    This class has a 8x8 table with all squares It initializes placement of squares and pieces on board It also changes the 8x8 table when the movement is done
    Game
    This class controls the game by starting it, moving pieces, determining winner
    GameLogic
    This class contains static methods that are checking game state using 8x8 table from chessboard
    Move
    This class carries an information on from what to what square player wants to move Later if the move is promotion change the promotion boolean to true then also it can be given a promotion piece
    PieceBehaviour
    This class has static methods for determining all possible moves for a single square of the board
    Square
    This class contains x, y to determine position on the board and Piece object Basic tile on the chess board with a piece standing on it
